𓃀 𓍔 𓏏 𓅱 𓆙 | avoiding | √bend √vacuus <> forbūgan “to bend away from” 𓍋 𓃀 𓂻 | avoid | √bend 𓂾

𐎁𐎘𐎐 bṯn

𓆑

𓆑 ϩⲟϥ ⇔ foul vile rot 𓆑 𓈖 𓏏 𓆑 (become maggoty)
𓆑 foul < 腐烂 fǔlàn 腐化 fǔhuà 𐍆𐌿𐌻𐍃 πῦον փտել pʿtel पूयति pūyati πύθειν ⇔ python 부패하다 bupaehada پوسیدن pusidan

bunt

𒂍𒊏𒈬 bit-ra-mu
𒂍𒊏𒈬 multicolored ⇔

𓋴 𓍋 𓃀 𓏏 𓆙 | particoloured snake | 1. serpent (𓃀𓏏bunt 𐎁 𐎘𐎐 bṯn ) 2. gypt ⇔ Egypt
𓋴 𓍋 𓃀 𓆄 𓏏 𓏤 𓆃 𓏥 | many coloured of plummage (of Solar Horus) | 色 sè.bunt
